Package com.secres

Class ThermometerAvgChart

java.lang.Object
com.secres.AbstractGraph
com.secres.ThermometerAvgChart
public class ThermometerAvgChart
extends AbstractGraph
A class creating the thermometer chart's view with the "AverageYearTempChart" scatter plot model.
Author:
Pranav Amarnath
